version_description:
- added wireless keyboard alt key mapping as an option
- using large fonts in iOS would give a wrong display
- general bug fixing

- new icon.
- removed icons from the main menu.
- general bug fixing.

- macro can have a name
- added enter and macro keys in banner
- general bug fixing

- reconnect.
- mouse can be used behind at the black banner at the bottom of the screen.
- bug fixing.
- warning: all passwords made in earlier versions will be reset.

- camera as barcode scanner
- bug fixing

- New lite version limitation. Now full keyboard and mouse support, but a 2 minutes session limitation.
- Support for Swiftpoint GT hardware mouse.
- General bug fixing.

- IP address field in menu - configure could be hidden
- General bug fixing

- Hold down the space bar to drag (left mouse key down) the mouse on the screen.
- Support for older protocol.

- Support for NLA (Network Level Authentication)
- Landscape mode was wrong on iPhone X
- Bug fixing

With latest Windows update, NLA uses a brand new CredSSP version. For the moment turn off NLA on PC and mocha RDP, if the connection is rejec

- Better layout for devices without a home button
- General bug fixing

- Hold down the space bar to drag (left mouse key down) the mouse on the screen.
- Support for older protocol.

- Solved problem with iPad menu and portrait mode
- General bug fixing
- Fast text input (when in session with a PC, select this new function from the menu).
